results.description: Combine hedge fund ownership percent with recent specific return to capture mean-reversion in crowded names. Applied SUGGESTION1 (used 2 fields). SUGGESTION2 not applied (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3 not applied (coverage=1.0). SUGGESTION4 applied (hedge_fund_ownership_percent has high userCount). Kept implementation short and <=7 operators and <=2 datafields. Confidence set to 0.72 because hedge-fund crowding often mean-reverts but timing uncertain.

Trade on short-term momentum of daily specific returns. SUGGESTION1 applied (single strong field + TS op). SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not applied. SUGGESTION4 applied (daily_specific_return has good alphaCount). Keep concise. Confidence 0.68 because short-term specific-return momentum is effective but noisy.

Long stocks with high rsk70...value and small market cap (size) advantage. SUGGESTION1 used both fields. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage high). SUGGESTION4 used high userCount fields (value,size). Confidence 0.7; value+size is classic with moderate edge.

Short residual volatility (resvol) spikes that revert by combining resvol with recent specific return. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION4 used resvol (good userCount). SUGGESTION2/3 not applied. Confidence 0.63: residual vol mean-reverts somewhat.

Favor stocks where factor momentum aligns with positive sentiment: multiply momentum loading and sentiment loading. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied (both fields high userCount). SUGGESTION2/3 not applied. Confidence 0.75 since aligned factor signals often persistent.

Short names with recent positive specific returns and high short interest may mean-revert. Use short interest and daily specific return. SUGGESTIONS: used S1 and S4 (shortint high userCount). S2/3 not applied. Confidence 0.66.
Exploit high earnings yield (earnyild) with improving specific returns indicating value re-rating. Applied SUGGESTION1 & S4 (earnyild userCount high). S2/3 not applied. Confidence 0.67.

Use prospect-specific daily surprises (prospect_specret_daily) combined with specific return momentum for short horizon trades. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Coverage high so no backfill. Confidence 0.71.
Long stocks where hedge fund ownership percent is increasing but recent specific returns negative (expect squeeze). SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. S2/3 not applied. Confidence 0.6—behavioral but riskier.

Favor momentum among midcap names to avoid extreme microcap noise: combine momentum loading and midcap factor. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied (midcap and momentum have solid userCount). S2/3 not applied. Confidence 0.69.

Short interest surges combined with negative recent specific returns can lead to continuation or squeeze; here we target mean-reversion: short high short interest with positive recent specific return. Applied SUGGESTION1 & S4. Confidence 0.62.

Use daily specific return momentum while neutralizing market via market factor: ts_zscore(daily_specific_return,10) minus market loading effect. SUGGESTION1 applied. S4 used market and dsrt. Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: Value reversal with specific risk filter
results.description: Long value (rsk70...value) but only if specific risk variance low to avoid idiosyncratic blowups. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. S2/3 not applied. Confidence 0.65.
Favor high earnings quality loading while recent specific return trending up. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied; earnings quality coverage high (0.9512). S3 not applied. Confidence 0.68.
Combine dividend yield factor loadings with improving specific return momentum to capture yield-recognition moves. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied (divyild userCount high). Confidence 0.64.
Exploit rsk70 1d reversal loading: short recent winners and long recent losers with dsrt confirmation. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied (1drevrsl massively used). Confidence 0.76.
Favor momentum only in profitable companies: momentum * profit loading. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Specific return zscore scaled by market cap
results.description: Scale specific-return zscore by inverse market cap to emphasize smaller names with real idiosyncratic moves. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.63.
Detect potential squeezes where short interest high but hedge-fund ownership rising with positive specific returns. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.58 (event-driven).
Blend value, size, and momentum to get diversified small-value momentum exposure. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields used per rule to respect KEEP_IN_MIND). S4 used. Confidence 0.7.
Divide momentum by specific risk (srisk) to favor momentum with lower idiosyncratic risk. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.72.
Mean-revert extreme prospect specific returns (prospect_specret_daily) using ts_zscore short window. SUGGESTION1 applied with single strong field. S4 used. Confidence 0.61.
Boost momentum signals when sentiment loading is positive. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied (sentmt high userCount). Confidence 0.73.
Use ts_delta of daily specific return to capture rapid reversals after large moves. SUGGESTION1 used single TS op. S4 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Favor names with both high value loading and high earnings quality. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.68.
Short names with low short interest but extremely positive recent specific returns (crowded winners). SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Momentum filtered by profit loading — momentum stronger in profitable firms. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.67.
Long high dividend-yield loadings but subtract market exposure to be market-neutral. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.62.
High short-term stddev of daily_specific_return signals transient moves; fade them. Use ts_std_dev and reverse. SUGGESTION1 applied (single field TS op). S4 used. Confidence 0.58.
Long high earnings yield with upward specific-return momentum. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.
Scale short interest by market cap to emphasize impactful shorting in smaller names. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.61.

Apply momentum loading within semiconductor exposure (semiconductors_exposure_score). SUGGESTION1 applied; both fields coverage 1.0. S4 used (semiconductor fields have decent userCount). Confidence 0.65.
Long names with high industry-specific prospect surprise vs industry (use prospect_specret_daily and industry exposure like semiconductors_exposure_score). SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.6.
If current specific return is maximum in short window, expect reversal. Use ts_arg_max on daily_specific_return. SUGGESTION1 applied. S4 used. Confidence 0.64.
Detect rising hedge-fund ownership percent with low ownership count (few funds increasing %) indicating concentrated bets. Use ownership percent and count. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by specific risk variance
results.description: Scale momentum by inverse of specific risk variance to prefer reliable momentum. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Short-term reversal in prospect monthly surprises
results.description: Fade extreme prospect monthly surprises using ts_zscore short-term. SUGGESTION1 applied. S4 used. Confidence 0.6.
Multiply momentum by low specific variance to reduce noise. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.68.
Combine earnings quality and management quality to favor well-run profitable firms. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied (mgmtqlty coverage ~0.88). Confidence 0.66.
High short interest with rising specific returns signals potential squeeze; boost exposure. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Long momentum in high-profit names and short momentum in low-profit names using group neutralization by profit via multiply and reverse. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.65.
Use rsk70 dsrt (specific returns factor) zscore to find persistent residual returns. SUGGESTION1 applied. S4 used (dsrt userCount high). Confidence 0.7.
If current specific return is minimum in a lookback, expect bounce. Use ts_arg_min on daily_specific_return. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Neutralize momentum by size to avoid microcap bias: group-neutralization analog via subtracting size loading times momentum. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.
Stocks held by few hedge funds but with improving specific returns may be under the radar. Use ownership_count and dsrt. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Require both short interest rise and momentum loading to open short positions. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Exploit stocks with high value loading but low momentum (potential re-rating). SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.64.
Use ts_decay_linear on daily_specific_return to weight recent signals more heavily. SUGGESTION1 applied (TS op). S4 used. Confidence 0.63.
Short extreme dividend-yield loadings that have spiked recently using ts_zscore. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.55.
Avoid names with extreme kurtosis in specific returns; prefer stable tails. Use ts_kurtosis on daily_specific_return. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Long names with positive prospect_specret_daily momentum. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.
High short interest but low industry exposure could indicate idiosyncratic shorts; fade with specific returns. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Earnings yield x low specific risk
results.description: Favor high earnings yield names with low specific variance. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.67.
Scale momentum by unadjusted specific risk (srisku) to reduce exposure to noisy momentum. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.68.
Fade extreme dsrt (specific returns factor) using ts_zscore short window. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.65.
Identify small-sized value names by multiplying inverse size and value loading. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Reverse extreme sentiment zscores expecting mean-reversion. SUGGESTION1 applied (single field). S4 applied (sentmt high alphaCount). Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum x low specific risk variance
results.description: Boost momentum where specific risk variance is low to reduce tail events. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.69.
Prospect surprise signals are more actionable in smaller names; scale by inverse market cap. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.6.
When short interest spikes but dsrt is negative, expect mean-revert bounce. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.57.
Value names with sudden positive dsrt may continue re-rating; combine value and dsrt momentum. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.
Boost earnings yield signal where sentiment is improving. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.63.
Use ts_ir on daily_specific_return to find names with consistent positive idiosyncratic performance. SUGGESTION1 applied. S4 used. Confidence 0.7.
Favor momentum in names with strong management quality. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.
Short names with high short interest but low srisk are more likely to experience squeezes; use shortint/srisk. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Prefer dividend-yield loadings with low specific risk variance. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.61.
Require both momentum loading and industry exposure (net_retail_exposure_score) to align. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Favor momentum where specific-return stddev is low (ts_std_dev). SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.64.
Long names where hedge funds are increasing percent ownership and dsrt positive. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Favor value names with low unadjusted specific risk (srisku) to avoid distress value. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.67.
Rank recent momentum via ts_rank to capture persistence. SUGGESTION1 applied. S4 used. Confidence 0.69.
Detect abrupt increases in short interest via ts_delta and fade via reverse. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Combine earnings quality with prospect surprise to find quality companies beating expectations. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.
Scale specific-return signals by inverse size to emphasize impactful small-cap moves. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Favor momentum where specific-return kurtosis is low to reduce tail risk. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.63.
Prefer dividend-yield names with low srisk to avoid dividend traps. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.61.
Bet against momentum where short interest is rising (crowded shorts). SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Use ts_zscore and winsorize on daily_specific_return to limit outlier effects. SUGGESTION1 applied; kept operators minimal. S4 used. Confidence 0.66.
Long names with high earnings yield but low profit loading (undervalued turnaround). SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Boost momentum when monthly prospect surprise is positive. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.64.
Weight dsrt by short interest to target mispricings under shorting pressure. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Dividend yield signal neutralized by market exposure to isolate yield effect. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.61.
Exploit negative autocorrelation in very short-term specific returns using ts_corr of lagged dsrt and current dsrt. SUGGESTION1 applied. S4 used. Confidence 0.57.
Prefer momentum where days_from_last_change is small (recent change) to capture continuation. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Reverse extreme hedge_fund_ownership_percent zscores expecting mean reversion. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Rotate into names that improved in value loading and have rising momentum. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.
Long names where residual volatility decreased while dsrt turned positive — stability plus performance. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.63.
Within semiconductors, prefer momentum where short interest low to avoid crowded shorts. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.61.
Fade extreme prospect daily surprises expecting reversion. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Combine high earnings quality with low srisku to find sound undervalued names. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.67.
Prefer momentum where residual volatility is low to reduce drawdown risk. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.68.
Boost earnings yield where short interest is high (contrarian). SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Avoid names with high specific_risk_uncertainty while taking dsrt signals. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.65.
Multiply momentum loading by short-window prospect surprise for quick plays. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.64.
Favor value names with low specific-return kurtosis to reduce tail risk. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.63.
Long names where hedge_fund_ownership_percent increases but dsrt improves faster, implying growing conviction. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Short names with persistently high short interest and poor prospect surprises. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Favor momentum where specific risk variance is low. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.69.
Require both earnings yield and momentum to be positive to increase conviction. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.
Use ts_quantile on daily_specific_return to create normalized momentum signal robust to distributional issues. SUGGESTION1 applied. S4 used. Confidence 0.68.
Short names where short interest rises but momentum loading is improving — potential squeeze candidates. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Value names with increasing ownership percent but low fund count may be early buy signals. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Use ts_regression to get slope of momentum loading and prefer positive slopes. SUGGESTION1 applied (TS regression). S4 used. Confidence 0.7.
Boost prospect surprises in names with low short interest to reduce crowding. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Combine earnings quality with low kurtosis of specific returns for stable alpha. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.description: Use dsrt zscore scaled by inverse market cap to exploit small-cap idiosyncratic moves. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.62.

Boost value names with positive prospect surprises to capture re-ratings. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.65.

results.description: Fade rapid hedge-fund ownership percent spikes if dsrt negative. SUGGESTION1 & S4 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.description: Apply hump to momentum signal to reduce turnover using hump operator. SUGGESTION1 applied. S4 used. Confidence 0.66.
